===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=じょきょうおう|女|tr1=jo|t1=woman, female|教皇|tr2=kyōō|t2=high priest, hierophant}}.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|じょきょうおう}}

# A [[high priestess]]
# {{lb|ja|tarot}}: The High Priestess; the second [[trump]] or [[major arcana]] [[card]] in most traditional Tarot decks.
